summary: Internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, where the New York Field Office's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) requests assistance for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a high-profile case and a unique opportunity.

events.title: FBI Request for Investigation Assistance
events.description: FBI New York Field Office's Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends out a request for assistance related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation, describing it as a high-profile case and a unique opportunity.

keyFacts: The FBI's New York Field Office was actively seeking assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation as of July 29, 2020.
Squad C-20, focused on VCAC (Violent Crimes Against Children)/HT (Human Trafficking), was leading this investigative effort.
The investigation was described internally as a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for agents.
The email chain indicates coordination between different FBI personnel or offices regarding resource allocation for the case.
